Full Description: Fever Smart allows parents to remotely monitor their children's temperature from anywhere in the world using their smartphone. Fever Smart’s technology is simple and easy to use. Here’s how it works: a small electronic device, or “Brain Unit,” is attached to the patient via a disposable patch, and the “Relay Unit” sits in the same room.
